welcome_hook: Great to see you back! It's always a good feeling to reach the end of a session, and we successfully completed our last one.
last_session_summary: This session covered general topics and ended on a neutral note. We didn't uncover any key moments or leave any topics unfinished, which is a good sign.
personal_relevance: "Evening session! Horses doing well after the weekend?"
suggested_opener: Hey there! Good to see you again. Horses holding up okay after their weekend adventures?
